sentences: Panime, seadsime, korjasime oma kodinad kokku ja olime minekuvalmis.
.. teen linnaga lõpparve, löön kodinad auto peale ja põrutan Karksi kanti metsavahiks.
context: The word 'löön' in Estonian appears to be a variant or archaic form of 'kodin', which has two main meanings: 1) old, worn-out clothing, rags, or garments; 2) junk, belongings, or stuff. In the context provided, it seems to refer to putting belongings/junk onto an automobile before moving.
